name: Task Guardian
description:
Play as a computer’s antivirus, and defeat the Grand Virus that is taking over the users computer that you vowed to protect in this Turn-Based, Roguelike RPG!

This game was made for a project in my Level 3 Games Production course. I focused on creating almost all of the visual aspects in the game, as well as the combat system embedded within. 

I am aware of some of the bugs in the game (including the name of the exectu, which may be addressed in the future, but for now I have left them as is due to it being a prototype project demo for my course.

CONTROLS - 

WASD - Movement

LEFT CLICK (in battle) - Select Combat Option
